Source.Name: python-pickleshare
Source.Summary: File system based database that uses python pickles.
Source.Description: File system based database that uses python pickles. Like shelve, a PickleShareDB object acts like a normal dictionary. Unlike shelve, many processes can access the database simultaneously. Changing a value in database is immediately visible to other processes accessing the same database.

Package.Name: python-pickleshare
